name: Stinger
notes:
Stingers receive a slight buff to recoil reduction, making their burst fire more controllable.
The Title_FireRate1_Stinger title is given to Submachine guns whose Fire Rate reaches 12.1. The title's effect provides some recoil reduction, and 3 extra bullets in the magazine. Please see stat modifiers for an explanation on how to interpret all of these modifiers.
